postlist.title: Test：图表
postlist.content:
Test:图表

flowchart#

Plugin: https://github.com/bubkoo/hexo-filter-flowchart

生成流程图。

sequence#

Plugin: https://github.com/bubkoo/hexo-filter-sequence

生成UML序列图。

主题标签#

Next> Mermaid#

Next> Mermaid-doc

从文本生成图表和流程图

流程图#

doc

从上到下

            graph TB
            Start --> Stop

从左到右

            graph LR
            Start --> Stop

顺序图#

doc

            sequenceDiagram
            Alice->>John: Hello John, how are you?
John-->>Alice: Great!

类图#

doc

            classDiagram
            Animal <|-- Duck
Animal <|-- Fish
Animal <|-- Zebra
Animal : +int age
Animal : +String gender
Animal: +isMammal()
Animal: +mate()
class Duck{
    +String beakColor
    +swim()
    +quack()
}
class Fish{
    -int sizeInFeet
    -canEat()
}
class Zebra{
    +bool is_wild
    +run()
}

状态图#

doc

            stateDiagram-v2
            [*] --> First
state First {
    [*] --> second
    second --> [*]
}

甘特图#

doc

            gantt
            title A Gantt Diagram
dateFormat  YYYY-MM-DD
section Section
A task           :a1, 2014-01-01, 30d
Another task     :after a1  , 20d
section Another
Task in sec      :2014-01-12  , 12d
another task     : 24d

饼形图#

doc

            pie title Pets adopted by volunteers
            "Dogs" : 386
"Cats" : 85
"Rats" : 15
